metatypes.name: Human
metatypes.description: The most common metatype, humans are versatile and adaptable with higher Edge potential.

metatypes.name: Elf
metatypes.description: Graceful and charismatic, elves possess enhanced agility and social abilities along with low-light vision.

metatypes.name: Dwarf
metatypes.description: Sturdy and resilient, dwarves are shorter but stronger with natural resistance to toxins.

metatypes.name: Ork
metatypes.description: Physically powerful with enhanced strength and endurance, orks have low-light vision but reduced mental limits.

metatypes.name: Troll
metatypes.description: Massive and tough, trolls have the highest physical attributes, natural armor, and extended reach.

primaryAttributes.name: Body
primaryAttributes.description: Physical toughness, resistance to damage and illness.

primaryAttributes.name: Agility
primaryAttributes.description: Coordination, balance, and fine motor skills.

primaryAttributes.name: Reaction
primaryAttributes.description: Reflex speed and ability to respond to sudden changes.

primaryAttributes.name: Strength
primaryAttributes.description: Raw physical power and lifting capacity.

primaryAttributes.name: Willpower
primaryAttributes.description: Mental fortitude, determination, and resistance to mental manipulation.

primaryAttributes.name: Logic
primaryAttributes.description: Analytical thinking, memory, and deductive reasoning.

primaryAttributes.name: Intuition
primaryAttributes.description: Gut instincts, perception, and ability to read situations.

primaryAttributes.name: Charisma
primaryAttributes.description: Force of personality, persuasiveness, and social presence.

specialAttributes.name: Edge
specialAttributes.description: Luck and ability to push outcomes in your favor.

specialAttributes.name: Essence
specialAttributes.description: Measure of life force, reduced by cyberware and bioware.

specialAttributes.name: Magic
specialAttributes.description: Magical aptitude. Only available to Awakened characters.

specialAttributes.name: Resonance
specialAttributes.description: Connection to the Resonance. Only available to Technomancers.

derivedAttributes.name: Physical Condition Monitor
derivedAttributes.description: Boxes of physical damage before overflow.

derivedAttributes.name: Stun Condition Monitor
derivedAttributes.description: Boxes of stun damage before unconsciousness.

categories.name: Metatype
categories.description: Determines available metatypes and special attribute points.

categories.name: Attributes
categories.description: Points to distribute among physical and mental attributes.

categories.name: Skills
categories.description: Skill points and skill group points.

categories.name: Resources
categories.description: Starting nuyen for gear and lifestyle.

paths.name: Magician
paths.description: Full magical practitioner with access to all magical skills and abilities.

paths.name: Mystic Adept
paths.description: Combines magical abilities with adept powers. Cannot astrally project.

paths.name: Adept
paths.description: Channels magic internally for physical enhancement.

paths.name: Aspected Magician
paths.description: Magician limited to one magical skill group (Sorcery, Conjuring, or Enchanting).

paths.name: Technomancer
paths.description: Naturally interfaces with the Matrix through Resonance.

combat.name: Clout
combat.description: Direct stun damage via magical force.

combat.name: Flamethrower
combat.description: Elemental fire attack in a cone.

combat.name: Lightning Bolt
combat.description: Electrical attack that ignores some armor.

combat.name: Manabolt
combat.description: Direct mana damage to living targets.

combat.name: Stunbolt
combat.description: Direct stun damage to living targets.

detection.name: Combat Sense
detection.description: +1 die per hit to defense tests.

health.name: Decrease [Attribute]
health.description: Reduce one attribute. Choose attribute when learned.

health.name: Increase [Attribute]
health.description: Boost one attribute. Choose attribute when learned.

health.name: Increase Reflexes
health.description: Add +1 Reaction and +1d6 Initiative per hit.

health.name: Stabilize
health.description: Prevent dying character from bleeding out.

illusion.name: Agony
illusion.description: Cause intense pain, -1 die per net hit.

illusion.name: Phantasm
illusion.description: Create realistic illusion for living viewers.

illusion.name: Stealth
illusion.description: Reduce all sounds made by target.

illusion.name: Trid Phantasm
illusion.description: Create realistic illusion with physical presence.

manipulation.name: Levitate
manipulation.description: Lift and move objects or creatures.

manipulation.name: Shape [Material]
manipulation.description: Reshape materials. Choose material when learned.

complexForms.name: Diffusion of [Matrix Attribute]
complexForms.description: Lower target's Matrix attribute. Choose attribute when learned.

complexForms.name: Infusion of [Matrix Attribute]
complexForms.description: Boost target's Matrix attribute. Choose attribute when learned.

complexForms.name: Primed Charge
complexForms.description: Add hits to next Matrix action as bonus dice.

complexForms.name: Puppeteer
complexForms.description: Force device to perform a Matrix action.

complexForms.name: Pulse Storm
complexForms.description: Crash all icons in an area.

complexForms.name: Resonance Channel
complexForms.description: Grant sprite ability to use complex forms.

complexForms.name: Resonance Veil
complexForms.description: Make icon appear as something else.

positive.name: Ambidextrous
positive.summary: Ignore off-hand penalties; both hands treated equally.

positive.name: Analytical Mind
positive.summary: +2 dice to Logic tests involving pattern analysis.

positive.name: Aptitude
positive.summary: Raise one skill max to 7 at creation, 13 after.

positive.name: Codeslinger
positive.summary: +2 dice to one chosen Matrix action.

positive.name: Double-Jointed
positive.summary: +2 dice to Escape Artist; fit into tight spaces.

positive.name: Exceptional Attribute
positive.summary: Increase natural max of one attribute by 1.

positive.name: First Impression
positive.summary: +2 dice to Social tests during first meetings.

positive.name: Guts
positive.summary: +2 dice to resist fear and intimidation.

positive.name: Photographic Memory
positive.summary: Perfect recall; +2 dice to Memory tests.

positive.name: Toughness
positive.summary: +1 die to Body for Damage Resistance.

negative.name: Addiction (Severe)
negative.summary: Weekly cravings, –4 dice plus –2 Social always.

negative.name: Allergy (Uncommon, Mild)
negative.summary: –2 dice to Physical tests when exposed.

negative.name: Allergy (Common, Mild)
negative.summary: –2 dice to Physical tests when exposed.

negative.name: Allergy (Common, Moderate)
negative.summary: –4 dice to Physical tests when exposed.

negative.name: Code of Honor
negative.summary: Bound by strict rules about who may be harmed.

negative.name: Combat Paralysis
negative.summary: First Initiative halved; –3 on Surprise tests.

negative.name: Low Pain Tolerance
negative.summary: Wound modifiers every 2 boxes instead of 3.

negative.name: Uncouth
negative.summary: –2 dice to resist social impulses; double Karma for Social skills.

lifestyles.name: Street
lifestyles.description: Living on the streets with no permanent shelter.

lifestyles.name: Low
lifestyles.description: A small apartment in a rough neighborhood.

lifestyles.name: Medium
lifestyles.description: A comfortable apartment with basic amenities.

lifestyles.name: High
lifestyles.description: Upscale housing in a secure neighborhood.

lifestyles.name: Luxury
lifestyles.description: The finest accommodations money can buy.

armor.name: Armor Clothing
armor.description: Fashionable clothing with hidden armor weave.

armor.name: Chameleon Suit
armor.description: Thermoptic camouflage suit with ruthenium coating.

armor.name: Lined Coat
armor.description: Long armored coat popular with street samurai.

cyberdecks.name: Fairlight Excalibur
cyberdecks.description: The legendary Excalibur - the best money can buy.

electronics.name: Directional Jammer
electronics.description: Jams wireless signals in a cone (Rating 1-6).

electronics.name: Area Jammer
electronics.description: Jams wireless signals in an area (Rating 1-6).

ammunition.name: Flechette Ammo (100)
ammunition.description: Flechette rounds (+2 DV vs unarmored, +5 AP).

creationMethods.name: Priority System
creationMethods.description: Assign priorities A-E to Metatype, Attributes, Magic/Resonance, Skills, and Resources. Each priority used exactly once.

steps.title: Build Contacts
steps.description: Build your network of contacts using free Karma based on Charisma.

steps.title: Spend Karma
steps.description: Spend remaining Karma on spells, complex forms, or stat improvements. Max 7 Karma carryover.

budgets.label: Contact Karma
budgets.description: Free Karma for contacts = CHA x 3

constraints.description: Each priority level (A-E) must be used exactly once.
constraints.errorMessage: Each priority can only be assigned to one category.

constraints.description: Only one attribute can be at natural maximum at creation.
constraints.errorMessage: Only one attribute can be at its natural maximum.
Cannot spend more than 25 Karma on positive qualities.
Cannot gain more than 25 Karma from negative qualities.

constraints.description: Skills capped at 6 at creation (7 with Aptitude).
constraints.errorMessage: Skill rating cannot exceed 6 at creation (7 with Aptitude).

constraints.description: Gear availability cannot exceed 12 at creation.
constraints.errorMessage: Cannot purchase gear with availability higher than 12.
